snippet.title: Necrofugitive Alpha Trailer
snippet.description:
Necrofugitive is a 2D action game about an evil shapeshifter on the run from lawmen and merciless bounty hunters. Can you run, fight, morph, and claw your way to freedom?

Wishlist us on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1166890/Necrofugitive/
Follow development on Twitter : https://twitter.com/BlackGardendev
